shortlisted.name: Shivam
shortlisted.cover_letter: I am excited to apply for the position of Data Scientist at your company. With 5 years of experience in Python, Machine Learning, and Data Analysis, I am confident in my ability to contribute to your team and help drive data-driven decision making.

shortlisted.name: Amit
shortlisted.cover_letter: I am writing to express my interest in the Frontend Developer position at your company. With 3 years of experience in JavaScript, React, and Frontend Development, I am eager to bring my skills and passion for creating user-friendly interfaces to your team.
